Keywords: Avengers , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , Weapon X , X-Men
Real Name: Logan
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. Regeneration. When Wolverine uses it, before rolling the d6 you may instead remove his RALLY die to use it as the result. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)

Oathful
I like this Wolverine's simplicity, reminds me of the Uncanny X-Men common. Simpler times.
September 24, 2021
muel0017
[QUOTE=Goop;12151474]17 toughness is what really hurts this fig. Blades exploit is great damage but his survivability isn't. Even with that 5 rally for a full 3 regen he just isnt going to live that long. Unlike some other pieces, you still have to power action for the regen, its not FREE. Still though for a common and only 45 points he's not bad, especially on those last couple flurry clicks.[/QUOTE] 17 is pretty standard as far as defense goes. For 45pts I wouldn't expect him to have more, unless he had CR. For 45pts, he's a good common.
August 11, 2021
Goop
17 toughness is what really hurts this fig. Blades exploit is great damage but his survivability isn't. Even with that 5 rally for a full 3 regen he just isnt going to live that long. Unlike some other pieces, you still have to power action for the regen, its not FREE. Still though for a common and only 45 points he's not bad, especially on those last couple flurry clicks.

SpaceTitanium
Good staying power on the rally and consistency throughout, but can't help but reach for the HoX version for the fun and variety the team up cards offer. Hell, even if it was only the colossus one, i'd still probably reach for it because ya never know when you need a fastball special
